messages.message:
Brian
Hey, do you guys have any pictures from Mamoth Moutain with me?  Could you zip them and email them to bjcullinan@gmail.com?  Thanks!

Teresa
Are you making a power point?

Brian
I need them for historical purposes.
I find this type of information interesting and I want to explorer, so I am asking for a more complete historic set of activities and parties we have gone to together: http://gigaom.com/cloud/3-fascinating-and-pretty-portraits-of-personal-life-through-data/
3 fascinating (and pretty) portraits of personal life through data
For most people, the only data they'll ever really see about themselves are the pretty charts generated by applications like Mint or Jawbone. Some people take their personal data a little more seriously, tracking their lives for years, then showing the world what that looks like.
gigaom.com
I think I need another event.

Teresa
Looks like I don't have any, sorry!

Brian
Yeah, that's what Joe said too.
